Text: How come the low size? Only 904.72MB? How does that add up?
I always assumed that it had something to do with making the files more difficult for anti-P2P engines to find.  I have no idea if this is true or not.

Except that this isn't P2P.

Anyway, checked TvTorrents, 904.72MB size; still not nuked. So I guess it's right. Still, I wonder why or how.

Have scene standard changed? A few MB here and there is understandable, but when a whole 100MB just isn't there like it used to, I find it a bit alarming. :P
There was a 800MB file around for this show a while back. I guess it depends on who encodes it and how.
